 is a metaseries of science fiction anime OVA by the studio Artmic, with
 production by Youmex and AIC. The original character designs were by Kenichi
 Sonoda, though these were dropped for the Gall Force Revolution
 remake. http://www.gearsonline.net/gallforce GF GEARS Online
